column1: # These two utilities are available if you uncomment the line.
# Pipe menu to install and use Dropbox:
# Utility to set language if login greeter does not offer that option:

column2: x-terminal-emulator -T 'inxi -Fxrz' -e bash -c "inxi -Fxrz; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close'; read -srn1"
"x-terminal-emulator -T 'Select Default Browser' -e sh -c 'sudo update-alternatives --config x-www-browser; sleep 5'"
